scripts.dev: npm run createtable && npm run createarticletable && npm run createcommenttable && --exec babel-node app.js
scripts.start: npm run createtable && npm run createarticletable && npm run createcommenttable && nodemon --exec babel-node app.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=TEST npm run clean && NODE_ENV=TEST npm run createtable && NODE_ENV=TEST npm run createcommenttable && NODE_ENV=TEST npm run createarticletable && NODE_ENV=TEST nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register mocha --timeout 10000 ./server/test/user.test.js --exit
